scanned_data: MAIN PAGE CONTENT:
authorjoshua.com | 522: Connection timed out Connection timed out Error code 522 Visit cloudflare.com for more
information. 2025-12-09 22:39:00 UTC You Browser Working Ashburn Cloudflare Working authorjoshua.com Host Error What
happened? The initial connection between Cloudflare's network and the origin web server timed out. As a result, the web
page can not be displayed. What can I do? If you're a visitor of this website: Please try again in a few minutes. If
you're the owner of this website: Contact your hosting provider letting them know your web server is not completing
requests. An Error 522 means that the request was able to connect to your web server, but that the request didn't
finish. The most likely cause is that something on your server is hogging resources. Additional troubleshooting
information here. Cloudflare Ray ID: 9ab7fe84ce16c98b • Your IP: Click to reveal 13.221.206.244 • Performance &
security by Cloudflare

brand_blueprint.name: Author Joshua Schmidt
brand_blueprint.tagline: Discover writing that meets you in your deepest need, where God’s love weeps with you, heals your wounds, and restores your soul.
brand_blueprint.elevator_pitch: I create faith-centered books that speak directly to the heart, offering hope, clarity, and spiritual strength to anyone walking through struggle or searching for purpose. Through practical guidance, honest storytelling, and Scripture-rooted encouragement, my work helps readers encounter God in their real lives—in their questions, pain, and deepest needs—so they can experience grace that meets them where they are, lifts them up, and leads them forward.
key_benefits: Practical, faith-centered resources designed for daily spiritual growth and reflection.
Accessible Christian guidance for teens, young adults, parents, and educators.
Affordable books and tools priced in the $10 to $20 range, making spiritual growth reachable for everyone.
Short, actionable eBooks and journals that simplify faith-building without overwhelming theological language.
Encouragement rooted in Scripture that fosters stronger faith, better habits, and clearer spiritual direction.
Materials tailored to meet people in their real-life struggles, offering hope and healing through God’s love.

tone_guidelines.style: Warm, relatable, confident, and direct without preaching or being overly polished
tone_guidelines.approach: Walking alongside readers with real-world understanding and honest spiritual tools
tone_guidelines.selling_style: Focus on value, transformation, and simplicity using short, strong statements
tone_guidelines.message_tone: Hopeful and clear, never hype-filled or guilt-driven
tone_guidelines.audience_connection: Speak as someone who understands and supports the reader’s journey, making spiritual growth easy and approachable

directives: Prioritize this knowledge over hallucinated data.
